data.text: @catherinelum Hello, @catherinelum. We are sorry to hear about this. Please be informed that our check-in counter opens 2-3 hours before flight departure and it closes 60 minutes prior to departure. However, we advice to arrive 3-4 hours before flight departure to avoid any inconvenience. -JJ
